column6: North}}</ref> died aged 163) was the fourth [[Chieftain of the Dúnedain]], following his father, [[Aranuir]], upon his death in 2247.

column1: Aravir's rule was uneventful, except for the usual skirmishes with [[orcs]]. Aravir died in {{TA
column3: n}}, after having been Chieftain for seventy-two years, and was followed by his son [[Aragorn I]].<ref name="North"/>
